content.en: The SOURCE project has developed a questionnaire to understand how the different sectors involved in societal security interact, and whether or not they encounter any difficulties thereby. The aim is further to develop tools, processes and guidelines to improve the knowledge exchange between the different sectors. Herewith we invite you to support our EU project SOURCE by completing this questionnaire. It should not take more than a few minutes of your time: http://surveys.societalsecurity.net/index.php/874285/lang-en For more information on this initiative, you can hereby download the flyer.SOURCE_news_item

title.en: SOURCE project - Launch of Online-Questionnaire: “Building a network of excellence of Societal Security in Europe”
title.fr: SOURCE project - Launch of Online-Questionnaire: “Building a network of excellence of Societal Security in Europe”
